name: Ayat llah
greetingText: Your name isn’t just beautiful, Ayat—it feels like a piece of poetry written just for you. Every time I say it, it reminds me of how special you are, like a verse that lingers in my heart and never fades.
wishText: Happy Valentine’s Day, Ayat ❤️! You’re like a beautiful verse in my life, making every moment special. Wishing you a day as lovely as you are! 💫
